name: png-concat
description: 将多个分离的png图片合并成一张，并以相应的文件名生成css样式表

scripts.prepare: set app=concat.js&efront build&echo #!/usr/bin/env node>public\main&echo var concat = require("./concat");>>public\main&type coms\main.js>>public\main&type public\comm\concat>public\concat&rd /s /q public\comm

author: 不枝雀
